translations.text: and by the night when it darkens,
your Lord has not forsaken you, nor is He displeased with you,
and the Hereafter will indeed be better for you than the present life;<sup foot_note=212988>1</sup>
soon you will be gratified with what your Lord will give you.
Did He not find you orphaned and shelter you?<sup foot_note=212989>1</sup>
Did He not find you wandering, and give you guidance?
Did He not find you in want, and make you free from want?
Therefore do not treat the orphan with harshness,<sup foot_note=212990>1</sup>
and do not chide the one who asks for help;
but proclaim the blessings of your Lord.
